snippet: Mr. Hadzic was arrested in 2011 and faced war crimes charges, but he was released last year because he had terminal brain cancer....
abstract: Goran Hadzic, rebel leader of Serbs in Croatia who was held for trial by International Criminal Tribunal for war crimes, but later released due to terminal illness, dies at age 58.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hadzic was arrested in 2011 and faced war crimes charges, but he was released last year because he had terminal brain cancer.

headline.main: Goran Hadzic, Ex-Leader of Rebel Serbs in Croatia, Dies at 58
headline.print_headline: Goran Hadzic, 58, Ex-Chief of Rebel Serbs

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia
